description: Looking for an easy dinner recipe? Try this tasty 20-minute sausage recipe featuring delicious Angus beef sausages, slaw and soft wraps.
keywords: Mains,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Winter,Dinner Made Easy,Sesame free,Beef,Peanut free
name: Easy Sausage Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths caramelised onion & angus beef sausages

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a greased barbecue plate over medium-high heat. Spray sausages with oil. Cook sausages, turning regularly, for 15 minutes or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate. Cover with foil to keep warm.
Meanwhile, heat wraps on grill for 20 seconds each side or until warmed through.
Combine coleslaw and half the aioli in a bowl. Season with pepper.
Slice each sausage in half lengthways. Spread a little of the remaining aioli down the centre of each wrap. Top with slaw and sausages. Fold wraps to enclose filling and serve.
